name: Genius: Biology
summary: Genius: Task Force Biologie is an educational strategy game in which you are an UN-contractor. Your mission is to renaturate desolated landscapes in Africa, Indonesia, America, on the Mediterranean and Germany. To accomplish this, you direct a task force of scientists. After the renaturation you have to build up an agricultural production company, with many structures, that uses the natural resources wisely and researches the biotechnological progress.
